trans-unit.source: Represents an easing function that retracts the motion of an animation slightly before it begins to animate in the path indicated.
trans-unit.target: 表示會稍微撤銷動畫的影片，以動畫方式顯示在指定的路徑之前加/減速函數。

trans-unit.source: You can control when the "back up" behavior occurs in an animation by specifying the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingFunctionBase.EasingMode%2A> property value on an animation.
trans-unit.target: 您可以控制當 「 備份 」 行為，就會發生的動畫藉由指定<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingFunctionBase.EasingMode%2A>動畫的屬性值。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingFunctionBase.EasingMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following graph demonstrate the different values of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingFunctionBase.EasingMode%2A>, where *f*(*t*) represents the animation progress and *t* represents time.
trans-unit.target: 下圖示範不同的值<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingFunctionBase.EasingMode%2A>，其中*f*(*t*) 表示的動畫進度和*t*代表時間。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingFunctionBase.EasingMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: ![BackEase EasingMode graphs.](~/add/media/backease-graph.png "BackEase EasingMode graphs.")
trans-unit.target: ![BackEase EasingMode 圖形。] (~/add/media/backease-graph.png "BackEase EasingMode 圖形。")

trans-unit.source: The formula used for this function is the following.
trans-unit.target: 此函式所使用的公式如下所示。

trans-unit.source: ![BackEase formula.](~/add/media/backease-formula.png "BackEase formula.") > [!NOTE]
trans-unit.target: ![BackEase 公式。] (~/add/media/backease-formula.png "BackEase 公式。") > [!NOTE]

trans-unit.source: > Because this animation causes values to retract before progressing, the animation might interpolate into negative numbers unexpectedly.
trans-unit.target: > 因為這個動畫造成撤銷之前進行的值，動畫可能會進行插補到負數意外。

trans-unit.source: This can cause errors when animating properties that do not allow negative numbers.
trans-unit.target: 建立動畫的屬性不允許使用負數時，這可能會導致錯誤。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you apply this animation to the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Height%2A> of an object (e.g. from 0 to 200 with an <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingFunctionBase.EasingMode%2A> of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode>), the animation will attempt to interpolate through negative numbers for <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Height%2A> which will throw an error.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，如果您將套用至這個動畫<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Height%2A>的物件 (例如從 0 到 200 與<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingFunctionBase.EasingMode%2A>的<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode>)，動畫會嘗試進行插補，透過的負數<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Height%2A>這將會擲回錯誤。</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Height%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingFunctionBase.EasingMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Height%2A>

trans-unit.source: There are several other easing functions besides BackEase which you can explore using the following Silverlight sample.
trans-unit.target: 有數個其他加/減速函數以外，您可以內容探索如何使用下列的 Silverlight 範例 BackEase。

trans-unit.source: [Run this sample](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=139798&sref=easing_functions_gallery) In addition to using the easing functions included in the run-time, you can create your own custom easing functions by inheriting from <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingFunctionBase>.
trans-unit.target: [執行此範例](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=139798&sref=easing_functions_gallery)除了使用加/減速函數包含在執行階段中，您可以透過繼承自<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingFunctionBase>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingFunctionBase>建立您自己自訂的加/減速函數

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Object Element Usage ``` ```
trans-unit.target: # # XAML 物件項目用法``` ```

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.BackEase"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.BackEase"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the amplitude of retraction associated with a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.BackEase"></xref> animation.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定撤銷與相關聯的幅度<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.BackEase"></xref>動畫。

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[DP_ID_field_label](~/add/includes/dp-id-field-label-md.md)] <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BackEase.AmplitudeProperty> The larger the amplitude, the larger the retraction before and/or after the animation.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[DP_ID_field_label](~/add/includes/dp-id-field-label-md.md)]<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BackEase.AmplitudeProperty>振幅愈大，愈大撤銷前面或後面動畫。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BackEase.AmplitudeProperty>

trans-unit.source: ![Demonstrates different aplitude values.](~/add/media/backease-amplitude.png "Demonstrates different aplitude values.")
trans-unit.target: ![示範不同的 amplitude 值。](~/add/media/backease-amplitude.png "示範不同的 amplitude 值。")

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` ```
trans-unit.target: # # XAML 屬性使用方式``` ```

trans-unit.source: The amplitude of retraction associated with a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.BackEase"></xref> animation.
trans-unit.target: 撤銷與相關聯的幅度<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.BackEase"></xref>動畫。

trans-unit.source: This value must be greater than or equal to 0.
trans-unit.target: 此值必須大於或等於 0。

trans-unit.source: The default value is 1.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 1。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BackEase.Amplitude*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BackEase.Amplitude*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BackEase.Amplitude*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Freezable"></xref> derived class.
trans-unit.target: 建立的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Freezable"></xref>衍生的類別。

trans-unit.source: When creating a derived class, you must override this method.
trans-unit.target: 當建立衍生的類別時，您必須覆寫這個方法。

trans-unit.source: Animation classes inherit indirectly from <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable>間接繼承動畫類別

trans-unit.source: Because of this, you need to override the CreateInstanceCore method to construct a custom animation object.
trans-unit.target: 因為這個緣故，您需要覆寫 CreateInstanceCore 方法來建構自訂動畫物件。

trans-unit.source: The new instance.
trans-unit.target: 新的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Provides the logic portion of the easing function that you can override to produce the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode"></xref> mode of the custom easing function.
trans-unit.target: 提供您可以覆寫以產生的 easing 函式的邏輯部分<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode"></xref>自訂 easing 函式的模式。

trans-unit.source: This method transforms normalized time to control the pace of an animation for the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode> case of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingFunctionBase.EasingMode%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法來轉換控制<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode><xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingFunctionBase.EasingMode%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingFunctionBase.EasingMode%2A>的大小寫</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode>的動畫的速度的標準化的時間

trans-unit.source: You only have to specify your easing function for the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode> case because the implementation of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingFunctionBase.Ease%2A> method transforms `normalizedTime` for the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode> cases.
trans-unit.target: 您只需要指定您加/減速函數<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode>因為大小寫的實作<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingFunctionBase.Ease%2A>方法轉換`normalizedTime`如<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode>和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode>案例。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingFunctionBase.Ease%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode>

trans-unit.source: Normalized time (progress) of the animation.
trans-unit.target: 動畫的標準化的時間 （進度）。

trans-unit.source: A double that represents the transformed progress.
trans-unit.target: Double 值，表示已轉換的進度。
